## LiquityStore.state property

The current store state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get state(): LiquityStoreState<T>;
```

## Remarks

Should not be accessed before the store is loaded. Assign a function to [onLoaded](./arth-base.liquitystore.onloaded.md) to get a callback when this happens.

See [LiquityStoreState](./arth-base.liquitystorestate.md) for the list of properties returned.
